channel.title: Hi, I'm Ankita on Ankita"s chalknotes
channel.description: Recent content in Hi, I'm Ankita on Ankita"s chalknotes

item.title: Linux Users and Groups
item.description: A technical reference for understanding and managing Linux user groups and file permissions, including commands, best practices, and security tips.

item.title: Understand OSI and TCP/IP Models
item.description: An overview of the OSI and TCP/IP networking models, their layers, functions, and real-world applications.

item.title: Protocols and Ports for DevOps
item.description: A comprehensive guide to essential networking protocols and their port numbers in DevOps environments, covering HTTP, SSH, DNS, and more.

item.title: Understand OSI and TCP/IP Models
item.description: An overview of the OSI and TCP/IP networking models, their layers, functions, and real-world applications.

item.title: What Are Messages in LLM Chat Interfaces
item.description: Understanding the role of messages in LLM chat interfaces, their structure, and how they facilitate communication between users and AI models.

item.title: Understand TCP/IP Model
item.description: An overview of the TCP/IP model’s layers, comparison with OSI model, and explanation of data encapsulation.

item.title: Understand OSI Model
item.description: A detailed breakdown of the OSI model’s key layers—Physical, Data-Link, and Presentation—and their respective protocols and limitations.

item.title: Debugging Docker Images and Containers - A Practical Guide
item.description: Step-by-step practical guide for building, debugging, inspecting, and deploying Docker containers, including transfer to edge devices like Orange Pi.

item.title: What is DevOps? A Beginner's Guide
item.description: An overview of DevOps principles, best practices, and how to implement them in your projects using Python and GitHub Actions.
